ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuES

Class ElasticSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuES.ElasticSearch

  • public class ElasticSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class ElasticSearch deals with all elements of implementing Elastic Search. There are methods contained here for adding new Questions to the server, retrieving Questions from the server, and deleting questions from the server.
    Version:
    1.0 Nov.6/2014
    Author:
    Alex Makepeace, Wyatt Fleming

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElasticSearch()
      ElasticSearch() is the constructor for the ElasticSearch class object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addQuestion(Question Q)
      addQuestion() is a method that receives a question and tries to push said question online if there is an internet connection.
      void clearQuestions()
      The method ClearQuestions gets rid of all the questions currently saved to Elastic search.
      void deleteQuestion(int id)
      deleteQuestion() takes in the id of the question we are trying to delete and removes it from the server
      Question getQuestion(int id)
      getQuestion() retrieves a Question from the server if it exists
      java.util.ArrayList<Question> searchQuestion(java.lang.String searchString, java.lang.String field)
      searchQuestion() takes a searchString that we are hoping to match to other questions and returns a list of all the Question that are found on the server that matches the desired string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ElasticSearch

        public ElasticSearch()
        ElasticSearch() is the constructor for the ElasticSearch class object. The constructor instantiates the gson object

    • Method Detail

      • getQuestion

        public Question getQuestion(int id)
        getQuestion() retrieves a Question from the server if it exists
        Parameters:
        Q - takes in the Question object that we are hoping to retrieve
        Returns:
        a Question object retrieved by your method

      • addQuestion

        public void addQuestion(Question Q)
        addQuestion() is a method that receives a question and tries to push said question online if there is an internet connection.
        Parameters:
        Q - is given a question that is being added to the server

      • deleteQuestion

        public void deleteQuestion(int id)
        deleteQuestion() takes in the id of the question we are trying to delete and removes it from the server
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Question that we are hoping to delete

      • clearQuestions

        public void clearQuestions()
        The method ClearQuestions gets rid of all the questions currently saved to Elastic search.

      • searchQuestion

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> searchQuestion(java.lang.String searchString,
                                                    java.lang.String field)
        searchQuestion() takes a searchString that we are hoping to match to other questions and returns a list of all the Question that are found on the server that matches the desired string.
        Parameters:
        searchString - the string that we are searching for
        field - any narrowed down search field that we are looking for
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of questions that match our desired searchString
